org.traincontrol.automation

Class Layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.traincontrol.automation.Layout

  • public class Layout
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent layout as a directed graph to support fully automated train operation

    • Nested Class Summary

      • createPoint

        public Point createPoint(java.lang.String name,
                         boolean isDest,
                         java.lang.String feedback)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new point (i.e., a station or other landmark on your layout)
        Parameters:
        name - a unique identifier for the point
        isDest - are trains allowed to stop at this point? Requires s88 feedback to work properly.
        feedback - address of the corresponding feedback module, or null if none
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
